en_US.project_summary: Bool Network is a BTC verification layer, designed to seamlessly convey any messages across chains, significantly enhancing the security and scalability of the Bitcoin ecosystem without changing Bitcoin’s core consensus.

zh_CN.project_summary: 通过 Bool Leap 可以将 Bitcoin 上的资产 Leap 到 CKB 链上，利用 CKB 的智能合约图灵完备的特性进行 DeFi 等活动。
